title: 1 Bedroom in Pasadena | Brand New | BBQ/Picnic Area | SS Appliances
posting_body: Introducing Thistle, the newest design-centric mid-rise apartment community in Pasadena, CA.
Walk into your brightly lit apartment home with every detail thought out to give you convenience and ease.
Optimize your experience with amenities such as in-unit washer and dryer, stainless steel appliances and more.

At Thistle, you will live comfortably, knowing you are in a gated community that includes; outdoor socializing spaces, exercise facilities, package room, parking accommodations, pet-friendly facilities, and a highly walkable location near Urth Cafe, Intelligentsia Coffee, CPK, Cheesecake Factory and more as well as the Metro that will take you virtually anywhere in Los Angeles!
Thistle Pasadena apartments are situated in the perfect location in Pasadena, giving our residents access to a diverse community where there is something for everyone.
Shop, grab a bite to eat and experience lively nightlife in Old Town Pasadena.
Pasadena is also home to lovely must-see gardens such as The Huntington Library and Arlington Garden.
You'll also be conveniently located next to The Rose Bowl, which is the place to be if you are looking to go to flea markets, concerts, or special events.
If you are more of the outdoorsy type, you'll love being next door to Eaton Canyon trails, where you may even get to see the seasonal waterfall.
Pasadena is a culturally enriched, exciting place to be.
All of this and more will be at your fingertips when you choose Thistle Pasadena as your new home.
- We Offer Concierge Trash Pick Up
- Walking Distance to Old Town Pasadena
Pets Welcome with an Additional Deposit.

Thistle does not accept Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, Chows, Doberman Pinschers, German Shepherds, Mastiffs, Pit Bulls, Presa Canarios, Rottweilers, Shar Peis, Siberian Huskies, Staffordshire Terriers, Wolf Hybrids or any variation or mixes of these breeds.
Virtual tours available, call for full details
Price and availability are subject to change.
